sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.KMRecordPageUtilsSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Utils script for Knowledge Management record page.
Customers should not change this class directly. This class is never called directly.</description>
        <name>KMRecordPageUtilsSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var KMRecordPageUtilsSNC = Class.create();
KMRecordPageUtilsSNC.prototype = {
    PREFIX: "KMRecordPageScratchpad_",

    initialize: function() {},

    setEmbeddedQueries: function(recordSysId, fields) {
        var key = this.PREFIX + recordSysId;
        var fieldNamesList = [];
        for (var fieldName in fields) {
            fieldNamesList.push(fieldName);
            gs.getSession().putClientData(key + "_" + fieldName, fields[fieldName]);
        }
        gs.getSession().putClientData(key, fieldNamesList.join(','));
    },

    getEmbeddedQueries: function(recordSysId) {
        var key = this.PREFIX + recordSysId;
        var fieldNamesList = gs.getSession().getClientData(key);

        var outputFields = {};
        if (!gs.nil(fieldNamesList)) {
            var fieldNames = fieldNamesList.split(',');
            for (var i = 0; i < fieldNames.length; i++) {
                var fieldKey = key + "_" + fieldNames[i];
                var fieldContent = gs.getSession().getClientData(fieldKey);
                outputFields[fieldNames[i]] = fieldContent;
                // Should be cleared out of the session once used but will keep it for now to support a form glitch
                //  where HTML editors won't load on the form and have to refresh manually.
                // gs.getSession().putClientData(fieldKey, null);
            }
            // gs.getSession().putClientData(key, null);
            return outputFields;
        }
        return null;
    },

    type: 'KMRecordPageUtilsSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-03-20 20:22:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>19e9a6b98705065025f299b73cbb3505</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>KMRecordPageUtilsSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Knowledge Management Core" source="com.glideapp.knowledge">a8c6f4a43cb1311068bcf327dfe37f3e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_19e9a6b98705065025f299b73cbb3505</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-03-22 06:10:40</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
